languages.text: {n}Несколько точных надрезов — и по мясистому телу паразита проходят волны судорог, а тонкие щупальца начинают обмякать. Вы отсоединяете их, одно за другим, и через какое-то время паразит сам отцепляется от носителя. Тварь встряхивает конечностями — в предсмертных судорогах — и обмякает в ваших руках. Тело мужчины же падает в снег.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Несколько точных надрезов — и по мясистому телу паразита проходят волны судорог, а тонкие щупальца начинают обмякать. Вы отсоединяете их, одно за другим, и через какое-то время паразит сам отцепляется от носителя. Тварь встряхивает конечностями — в предсмертных судорогах — и обмякает в ваших руках. Тело мужчины же падает в снег.{/n}

languages.text: {n}After a few well-placed cuts, the parasite's meaty body convulses, making the thin tendrils go soft and unable to maintain their grasp. You dislodge them one after the other, and soon the parasite releases its host of its own volition. The creature twitches its appendages in its death throes and goes limp in your hands. The man's body collapses onto the snow.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько точных надрезов — и по мясистому телу паразита проходят волны судорог, а тонкие щупальца начинают обмякать. Вы отсоединяете их, одно за другим, и через какое-то время паразит сам отцепляется от носителя. Тварь встряхивает конечностями — в предсмертных судорогах — и обмякает в ваших руках. Тело мужчины же падает в снег.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}After a few well-placed cuts the parasite's meaty body is shaken with convulsions, making the thin tendrils go soft and unable to keep their grasp. You dislodge them one after the other, and soon the parasite lets go of its host on its own volition. The creature shakes its appendages in deathly throes and goes limp in your grasp. The man's body drops into snow.{/n}

{n}After a few well-placed cuts the parasite's meaty body is shaken with convulsions, making the thin tendrils go soft and unable to keep their grasp. You dislodge them one after the other, and soon the parasite lets go of its host on its own volition. The creature shakes its appendages in deathly throes and goes limp in your grasp. The man's body drops into snow.{/n}

The man's body collapses onto the snow.{/n}

You dislodge them one after the other, and soon the parasite releases its host of its own volition. The creature twitches its appendages in its death throes and goes limp in your hands. The man's body collapses onto the snow.{/n}

{n}After a few well-placed cuts, the parasite's meaty body convulses, making the thin tendrils go soft and unable to maintain their grasp. You dislodge them one after the other, and soon the parasite releases its host of its own volition. The creature twitches its appendages in its death throes and goes limp in your hands. The man's body collapses onto the snow.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你小心翼翼地切了几刀之后，寄生生物的躯体抽搐起来，细小的触须也开始变软，无法再抓住宿主的身体。你把这些触须一根接一根地剥开，很快，寄生生物便主动松开了它的宿主，在死亡的阵痛中抽搐着，在你的手中瘫软下来。男人的躯体也倒在了雪地上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few well-placed cuts, the parasite's meaty body convulses, making the thin tendrils go soft and unable to maintain their grasp. You dislodge them one after the other, and soon the parasite releases its host of its own volition. The creature twitches its appendages in its death throes and goes limp in your hands. The man's body collapses onto the snow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你小心翼翼地切了几刀之后，寄生生物的躯体抽搐起来，细小的触须也开始变软，无法再抓住宿主的身体。你把这些触须一根接一根地剥开，很快，寄生生物便主动松开了它的宿主，在死亡的阵痛中抽搐着，在你的手中瘫软下来。男人的躯体也倒在了雪地上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con unos pocos cortes bien aplicados, el cuerpo del parásito convulsiona, haciendo que los zarcillos flaqueen y no puedan sujetarse. Los separas uno tras otro y pronto el parásito abandona a su anfitrión. La criatura se retuerce, presa de sus últimos estertores, y queda inerte en tus manos. El cuerpo del hombre cae sobre la nieve.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few well-placed cuts, the parasite's meaty body convulses, making the thin tendrils go soft and unable to maintain their grasp. You dislodge them one after the other, and soon the parasite releases its host of its own volition. The creature twitches its appendages in its death throes and goes limp in your hands. The man's body collapses onto the snow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con unos pocos cortes bien aplicados, el cuerpo del parásito convulsiona, haciendo que los zarcillos flaqueen y no puedan sujetarse. Los separas uno tras otro y pronto el parásito abandona a su anfitrión. La criatura se retuerce, presa de sus últimos estertores, y queda inerte en tus manos. El cuerpo del hombre cae sobre la nieve.{/n}

languages.text: {n}うまい場所にいくつか切れ込みを入れると、寄生体の分厚い胴体がけいれんを起こし、細い触手はふにゃふにゃになって、そのまましがみついていられなくなる。触手をひとつずつ取り除いていくと、寄生体はそそくさと自ら宿主を解放した。その生き物は死の苦しみの中で触手をぴくぴく動かし、手の中でぐったりとする。男の体は雪の上に崩れ落ちた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few well-placed cuts, the parasite's meaty body convulses, making the thin tendrils go soft and unable to maintain their grasp. You dislodge them one after the other, and soon the parasite releases its host of its own volition. The creature twitches its appendages in its death throes and goes limp in your hands. The man's body collapses onto the snow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}うまい場所にいくつか切れ込みを入れると、寄生体の分厚い胴体がけいれんを起こし、細い触手はふにゃふにゃになって、そのまましがみついていられなくなる。触手をひとつずつ取り除いていくと、寄生体はそそくさと自ら宿主を解放した。その生き物は死の苦しみの中で触手をぴくぴく動かし、手の中でぐったりとする。男の体は雪の上に崩れ落ちた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nach einigen wohlplatzierten Schnitten durchziehen Krämpfe den fleischigen Körper des Parasiten, die dünnen Ranken verlieren an Spannung und können ihren Griff nicht aufrechterhalten. Du löst sie der Reihe nach, und schon bald gibt der Parasit seinen Wirt freiwillig frei. Die Kreatur schlägt im Todeskampf mit ihren Ranken um sich und erschlafft dann in deinen Händen. Der Körper des Mannes bricht auf dem Schnee zusammen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few well-placed cuts, the parasite's meaty body convulses, making the thin tendrils go soft and unable to maintain their grasp. You dislodge them one after the other, and soon the parasite releases its host of its own volition. The creature twitches its appendages in its death throes and goes limp in your hands. The man's body collapses onto the snow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einigen wohlplatzierten Schnitten durchziehen Krämpfe den fleischigen Körper des Parasiten, die dünnen Ranken verlieren an Spannung und können ihren Griff nicht aufrechterhalten. Du löst sie der Reihe nach, und schon bald gibt der Parasit seinen Wirt freiwillig frei. Die Kreatur schlägt im Todeskampf mit ihren Ranken um sich und erschlafft dann in deinen Händen. Der Körper des Mannes bricht auf dem Schnee zusammen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après quelques entailles bien placées, le corps charnu du parasite est pris de convulsions, et les fins tentacules se détendent, incapables de maintenir plus longtemps leur étreinte. Vous les délogez l'un après l'autre, et bientôt, la créature finit par lâcher spontanément son hôte. Dans les affres de la mort, ses appendices se contractent une dernière fois entre vos mains avant de s'immobiliser tout à fait. Le corps de l'homme s'affaisse sur le sol couvert de neige.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few well-placed cuts, the parasite's meaty body convulses, making the thin tendrils go soft and unable to maintain their grasp. You dislodge them one after the other, and soon the parasite releases its host of its own volition. The creature twitches its appendages in its death throes and goes limp in your hands. The man's body collapses onto the snow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après quelques entailles bien placées, le corps charnu du parasite est pris de convulsions, et les fins tentacules se détendent, incapables de maintenir plus longtemps leur étreinte. Vous les délogez l'un après l'autre, et bientôt, la créature finit par lâcher spontanément son hôte. Dans les affres de la mort, ses appendices se contractent une dernière fois entre vos mains avant de s'immobiliser tout à fait. Le corps de l'homme s'affaisse sur le sol couvert de neige.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Doğru konumlandırılmış birkaç kesik attıktan sonra parazitin etli bedeni şiddetle sarsılıyor, ince filizleri yumuşuyor ve kavrama yetisini kaybediyor. Bunları teker teker yerlerinden ayırdığında parazit, kendi kendine konağından ayrılıyor. Yaratık can çekişirken titriyor ve kendini ellerine bırakıyor. Adamın bedeni, karın üzerine yığılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few well-placed cuts, the parasite's meaty body convulses, making the thin tendrils go soft and unable to maintain their grasp. You dislodge them one after the other, and soon the parasite releases its host of its own volition. The creature twitches its appendages in its death throes and goes limp in your hands. The man's body collapses onto the snow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Doğru konumlandırılmış birkaç kesik attıktan sonra parazitin etli bedeni şiddetle sarsılıyor, ince filizleri yumuşuyor ve kavrayamaz hâle geliyor. Bunları teker teker yerlerinden ayırıyorsun ve parazit kendi kendine konağından ayrılıyor. Yaratık can çekişirken titriyor ve kendini ellerine bırakıyor. Adamın bedeni, karın üzerine yığılıyor.{/n}
